text: I think it's time for state and local to take over some of the messaging on this #COVID19 #vaccine. People, especially now, might want to see ppl in THEIR communities. Local Dr's, Nurses, EMTs, Firefighters, TEACHERS, Grocery Store Clerks. ppl they can TALK TO...imho...🤷🏾‍♀️ #msnbc https://t.co/9Kb8LKnibs
